description:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 300% of the daily performance of the MSCI Japan Index.
 The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus borrowing for investment purposes) in securities of the index, exchange-traded funds ("ETFs") that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or ETFs that track the index. The index is designed to measure the performance of the large- and mid-cap segments of the Japanese equity market, covering approximately 85% of the free float-adjusted market capitalization of Japanese issuers. The fund is non-diversified.
